input_text:
Job Title: Website Content Writer

Location: Burlington, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Public Relations, Writing/Editing

Description:
Description 

Core Responsibilities

 Partner with the information architect and SEO strategist roles to determine the content strategy for each section of the website. Listen to and meet w/ internal marketing and operational stakeholders to understand their needs. Perform secondary research on the scientific topics to best understand customer needs. Review existing copy on the sites today to determine what can be kept and what needs to be rewritten. Write the content, ensuring we are staying on-brand and utilizing current SEO practices. Partner with the UI/UX designers to adjust copy, as needed, to fit within layout constraints. Note: You will not need to post, layout the content, or copyedit as we have other roles who will be helping with those tasks.


 Skills 

Technical writing, Content writing, Content strategy

 Top Skills Details 

Technical writing,Content writing,Content strategy

 Additional Skills & Qualifications 

Website Content The actual website content will include a number of scientific topics including, but not limited to

 Specialties, diseases and conditions and their relevant testing Treatment methods and modalities such a cell and gene therapies, biomarkers, biologics and vaccines, etc. Scientific and laboratory testing disciplines such as pathology, toxicology, chemistry and biology, etc. Initially, we will be focused on rebuilding the b2b content on the sites for these core audiences: Healthcare providers and their hospital/healthcare systems as well as insurance/health plan providers Scientific researchers from pharma or academia, looking to develop a new therapeutic or drug


 Experience Level 

Intermediate Level

 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

Partner with the UI/UX designers to adjust copy, as needed, to fit within layout constraints.
